Title: Requires all school districts to purchase and provide assistive technology devices when an item is put on a student's individualized education program
Summary: Requires all school districts to purchase and provide assistive technology devices no later than two months after an item is put on a student's individualized education program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring all school districts to purchase and provide assistive technology devices when an item is put on an individualized education program
